title: Embroidered Picture, ca. 1790
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: embroidery on plain weave
provenance: Ex. coll. Fraser-Martin. Purchased from John Wanamaker.
creditline: Gift of Anonymous Donor from the Fraser/Martin Collection
description: Oval picture showing a female figure seated before a tombstone under a large tree.  Church and stream in background.  Inscription on stone: "In memory of Emma Corbett."
